Package com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration

This package contains base classes related to reading system configuration.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configuration
    Interface defining a Configuration instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseConfigurationFactory<E extends Configuration>
    Defines the interface of a configuration factory to obtain a given configuration implementation based on provided properties.
    ConfigurationFactory
    Base factory class to obtain and configure all modules of the application.
    PropertiesFileLocator<T>
    This class searches for a properties file in the root of the classpath of the deployed war or at the server user home directory.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Raised if something fails during configuration process.

Package com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration Description

This package contains base classes related to reading system configuration. The basic usage of configuration consists of a ConfigurationFactory that reads configuration from properties or generates a default one, and an immutable configuration instance that contains configuration parameters. Classes of this package are mostly abstract and are intended to be used as a way to configure other packages. Generally other packages will have other configuration factories that can be used to configure classes for that package only.
